eg_particle_interactions.config.title: Particle Interactions Config
eg_particle_interactions.config.blocks.d: Configure how particles are emitted when placing or breaking blocks
eg_particle_interactions.config.blocks.i: All config options in this tab are applied from top to bottom. This means if a block is specified in two separate particle types, it will only emit the particle higher up in the config menu

The maximum amount of particles that can spawn along each edge of the block when it is placed
Should %s particles spawn when a block is broken?
The maximum amount of particles that can spawn along each axis of the block when it is broken

These particles are intended for modded fluids that don't fit the options above. It will use the texture of the fluid instead of a splash texture, similar to vanilla block breaking particles
